content: toward the body this helps to flatten the tail fins ©2019 tatyana grigoryan �2 finishing stitch the body closed using mattress stitch fill lightly as you progress with the sewing when you get to the head make the eyes begin by using a small embroidery needle threaded with very light-weight white or yellow thread to form a series of small chain stitches in a tight closed circle pull all excess thread through to the interior use the black embroidery thread to make a single stitch in the center of the white circle repeat on the opposite side tuck in all loose ends and finish sewing the head shut enjoy your anchovy for best results be sure to use light-weight thread for the embroidery portion ©2019 tatyana grigoryan �3
